title: 1 dead, 3 injured after Washington Park shooting
content:
Illinois State Police Lt. David Bivins identified the victim of the early Sunday shootings as 18-year-old DeLarren S. Patterson of Washington Park.
Washington Park Police Detective James Mister says officers responded to an emergency call from Main Street Nightclub. Officials say the four were in a vehicle trying to drive away when about 30 bullets struck the car. Officials say the three injured victims were taken to nearby hospitals with non-life threatening injuries.
No arrests have been made. Illinois State Police and Washington Park police are investigating.
